private static String decodeRequestString(HttpServletRequest request, String contextPath) {
    if (contextPath.startsWith("/")) {
        contextPath = contextPath.substring(1);
    }
    if (contextPath.endsWith("/")) {
        contextPath = contextPath.substring(0, contextPath.length() - 1);
    }
    contextPath = URLDecoder.decode(contextPath, "UTF-8");
    return contextPath;
}

private static String encodeRequestString(HttpServletRequest request, String contextPath) {
    if (contextPath.startsWith("/")) {
        contextPath = contextPath.substring(1);
    }
    if (contextPath.endsWith("/")) {
        contextPath = contextPath.substring(0, contextPath.length() - 1);
    }
    contextPath = URLEncoder.encode(contextPath, "UTF-8");
    request.setAttribute(INCLUDE_CONTEXT_PATH_ATTRIBUTE, contextPath);
    return contextPath;
}

*/
    requestURI = decodeRequestString(request, requestURI);
    if (requestURI.endsWith("/")) {
        requestURI = requestURI.substring(0, requestURI.length() - 1);
    }
    return requestURI;
}

private static String decodeRequestString(HttpServletRequest request, String requestURI) {
    if (requestURI.startsWith("/")) {
        requestURI = requestURI.substring(1);
    }
    if (requestURI.endsWith("/")) {
        requestURI = requestURI.substring(0, requestURI.length() - 1);
    }
    requestURI = URLDecoder.decode(requestURI, "UTF-8");
    return requestURI;
}

private static String encodeRequestString(HttpServletRequest request, String requestURI) {
    if (requestURI.startsWith("/")) {
        requestURI = requestURI.substring(1);
    }
    if (requestURI.endsWith("/")) {
        requestURI = requestURI.substring(0, requestURI.length() - 1);
    }
    requestURI = URLEncoder.encode(requestURI, "UTF-8");
    request.setAttribute(INCLUDE_REQUEST_URI_ATTRIBUTE, requestURI);
    return requestURI;
}
